title: Italian Sausage and Spinach Cannelloni
ingredients: ['450g cannelloni', '225g Italian sausage, casings removed', '280g frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained and squeezed dry', '225g ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '500g pasta sauce', '225g grated mozzarella cheese']
